overview.tax_residency_rules: Individuals: 183-day rule. Businesses: Registered office or place of effective management in Lithuania.
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Annually for individuals by May 1. Quarterly for businesses.

personal_income_tax.exemptions: Personal allowance of 3,000 EUR per year. Various deductions and allowances.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 9% of salary (paid by employee) + 30.48% (paid by employer)

rate.long_term_rate: 5% (held more than 3 years, certain conditions apply).

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of the primary residence and certain inheritances are exempt.

property_tax.rate: 1% of assessed value (or 0.5% for residential property).

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Remote work contract with a non-Lithuanian employer. Monthly income of at least 3,500 EUR.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: No special tax benefits for digital nomads.

special_economic_zones.name: Klaipeda Free Economic Zone
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Corporate tax exemption for up to 10 years for certain businesses.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

crypto_tax.income_tax_rate: 15% for personal income, 15% for corporate income.
crypto_tax.capital_gains_rate: 15% for both personal and corporate capital gains.

nft_tax.income_tax_rate: 15% for personal income, 15% for corporate income.
nft_tax.capital_gains_rate: 15% for both personal and corporate capital gains.

additional_notes.political_risks: Stable political environment with strong rule of law.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Strong and growing economy, part of the Eurozone.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 11th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
